title: Winter Fest
desc: Come and enjoy the holiday season and cheer at the first annual Winter Fest at the OC Fair & Event Center!? Winter Fest embodies the spirit of the holidays, bringing fun and merriment to sunny Southern California!? For 17 days, rain or shine, come and experience live music and entertainment, stroll through the world?s largest illuminated ornament, sample a wide variety of holiday treats, sip hot cocoa and specialty craft cocktails, and enjoy an array of activities for guests of all ages including? Having both indoor and outdoor space, Winter Fest is ?El Nino? proof and a wonderland fit for family getaways, enchanted date nights or holiday parties! $10 Online/$15 On-site Includes: $20 Online/$25 On-site Includes: $15 Online/$20 On-site Includes: $25 Online/$30 On-site Includes:
